item.title: Parse Cloudflare Logs JSON data
item.description: Parse Cloudflare Logs JSON data ​â€‹ Overview After downloading your Cloudflare Logs data, you can use different tools to parse and analyze your logs. In this tutorial, you will learn how to parse your JSON log data using jq. To get started with jq, visit the jq official site External link icon Open external link . Notejq is a powerful command line for parsing JSON data and performing certain types of analysis.
